attributes.action: make all mps that have claimed unfair expenses from us the Britsh public pay that money back to the country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please sign this petition
The people we trusted with our public money have robbed us by making claims for simple everyday items that we the working coggs of this country struggle to pay for.
Our NHS struggles our schools struggle and we the people are struggling and all the time over many years our supposed leaders have robbed us all blind and I believe they should be made to pay  back to the country what they have robbed

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
